Night_Fall.help: Unleashes a cone shaped burst of particles from the Netherworld. All targets within the modest range of this power take Negative Energy damage and have a reduced Accuracy. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Night_Fall.targetHelp: Night Fall has reduced your Accuracy.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage over time.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage over time.

Dark_Embrace.help: You tap into the energy of the Netherworld to protect yourself from damage. This Dark Embrace shrouds you and grants resistance to Lethal, Smashing, Negative Energy and Toxic damage. Recharge: Fast
Dark_Embrace.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} protects you from lethal, smashing, toxic and negative energy.

Oppressive_Gloom.help: The Netherworld has many mutable properties, such as the Oppressive Gloom. This power allows you to use your own Hit Points to keep enemies near you Disoriented and unable to use any powers. Endurance cost for this is minimal, but the power can be dangerous to use. You must be level 41 and have Night Fall or Dark Embrace before selecting this power. Recharge: Moderate

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Special damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Special damage.

Soul_Tentacles.help: You can create a cone shaped rift to the Netherworld that allows the souls of the damned to slip into our reality. These Soul Tentacles will snare all foes within range, Immobilizing them while they drain their life. You must be level 41 and have Night Fall or Dark Embrace before selecting this power. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Soul_Tentacles.targetHelp: The Soul Tentacles are immobilizing you.

Soul_Storm.help: Like Ghost Widow, you can summon the souls of your victims to do your bidding. Soul Storm enraptures a single target Holding them while their life-force is drained from their body. You must be level 44 and have two other Soul Mastery Powers before selecting this power. Recharge: Slow
Soul_Storm.targetHelp: You are being Held by a Soul Storm. You are taking negative Damage over time as your life is drained.
